name: uzind4ALT

comment: Induction on the upper set of integers that starts at an integer ` M ` . The last four hypotheses give us the substitution instances we need; the first two are the basis and the induction step. Either ~ uzind4 or ~ uzind4ALT may be used; see comment for ~ nnind . (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2005.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
